Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Privacy Proxy - Browser Anonymization Tool v1.0.0

Complete implementation of browser privacy proxy with:
- Browser fingerprint randomization (User-Agent, headers, etc.)
- Comprehensive cookie blocking (bidirectional, dev/null behavior)
- Automatic tracker domain/IP blocking with SQLite database
- Pattern-based and adaptive blocking mechanisms
- Management CLI for stats, blocklist export, whitelisting
- Detailed technical architecture documentation with Mermaid diagrams

Core Components:
- privacy_proxy.py: Main mitmproxy addon
- fingerprint_randomizer.py: Fingerprint rotation engine
- cookie_interceptor.py: Cookie blocking and logging
- traffic_blocker.py: Domain/IP blocking system
- database_handler.py: Thread-safe SQLite operations
- manage.py: Management CLI interface
- start_proxy.py: Launcher script

Features:
- 4 rotation modes: every_request, interval, new_tab, launch
- SQLite database tracking all cookie attempts and requests
- Auto-blocking after configurable hit threshold
- Whitelist support for trusted domains
- Blocklist export in multiple formats (hosts, text, JSON)
- Comprehensive logging and statistics

Documentation:
- README.md: Complete user documentation
- QUICKSTART.md: 5-minute setup guide
- ARCHITECTURE.md: Technical architecture with 15+ diagrams
- development_diary.md: Development log
- Inline code documentation with proper headers

Version: 1.0.0
License: MIT (with ethical use disclaimer)
